body: @amihaiemil This task is yours, please go ahead keeping in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). If any questions, don't hesitate to ask right here

@amihaiemil **30 mins** is the budget of the task. This is exactly how much will be paid when the problem is solved (no matter how much time you will actually spend). See [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) for more information

issue.title: Pull request for #658

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body: fixed fetchLabelsRO() test in IssueTest, which failed because it violated the condition "repository should never be NULL"

body: @dmarkov I finished this and created a pull request for it just now: #677 . I'm waiting for a review.

@dmarkov Guard tried to merge the branch today but it couldn't because the test 
 RtReleasesITCase.canRemoveRelease() fails. It isn't mine, so I guess we're waiting for it to be resolved...
do you know the ticket number we're waiting for?

Seems like there is no opened issue on this topic. I looked and found issue #573 but it is already closed. I ran RtReleasesITCase myself and all the tests fail with 404 not found, when they try to remove the created repo.. On the other hand, Guard's build failed with 500 internal server error. I must admit, I'm a little confused.
I just created issue #682 on this topic. Should I ignore all the tests and update the pull request?

> @dmarkov we're waiting for #682 here

@yegor256 yes, waiting for #682
